pages.title: 舒适
pages.text: 在晚上时，站在篝火旁一定范围来获得$(thing)舒适$()效果。$(p)$(info)$(thing)舒适$()效果使进食的回复效果更好。$(p)$(warning)如果附近有怪物在游荡，这个效果就会消失。

pages.title: 吃饱喝足
pages.text: 在有$(thing)舒适$()效果时吃很多食物即可获得$(thing)吃饱喝足$()效果。$(p)$(info)$(thing)吃饱喝足$()效果会增加你的耐力。$(p)$(warning)这个效果会在效果时间结束后消失。

pages.title: 小憩
pages.text: 在晚上时，站在篝火旁一定范围不动来获得$(thing)小憩$()效果。$(p)$(info)$(thing)小憩$()效果可以缓慢地回复生命。$(p)$(info)一直站着可以提升$(thing)小憩$()效果的等级。$(p)$(warning)如果附近有怪物在游荡，这个效果就会消失。

pages.title: Well Rested
pages.text: Stand still with the $(thing)Resting$() effect to gain the $(thing)Well Rested$() effect.$(p)$(info) The $(thing)Well Rested$() effect adds two absorption hearts.$(p)$(warning) This effect will disappear over time.

pages.title: Focused
pages.text: Stand still with all effects to increase the $(thing)Focused$() effect duration.$(p)$(info) The $(thing)Focused$() effect increases experience gained.$(p)$(warning) This effect will disappear as you gain experience.
